ISSUE.TITLE: atom validation errors
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: evidently the atom we emit doesn't always validate. e.g. converting scraped instagram to atom gives us these errors from https://validator.w3.org/feed/ : ``` line 16, column 28: updated must be an RFC-3339 date-time: 2016-05-31T16:21:12 [help] <updated>2016-05-31T16:21:12</updated> line 74, column 32: published must be an RFC-3339 date-time: 2016-05-31T16:21:12 (24 occurrences) [help] <published>2016-05-31T16:21:12</published> line 75, column 30: updated must be an RFC-3339 date-time: 2016-05-31T16:21:12 (24 occurrences) [help] <updated>2016-05-31T16:21:12</updated> line 80, column 4: Undefined entry element: georss:featureName (11 occurrences) [help] <georss:featureName>U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services</georss:fe ... ``` thanks @cleverdevil for reporting!
